channel.title: Portfolios on Anton Karlsson

item.title: Way of the Turtle
item.description: Way of the Turtle Introduction You follow the adventure of the turtle couple Mr and Mrs Turtle, now shipwrecked on a tropical island after a huge storm. Not all turtles can swim you know... You are tasked with dealing with a crazy wizard in exchange for a way off the island. I joined the team at Illusion Labs in the very early stages of development of Way of the Turtle.
